description:
Keiichi makes his wish that Belldandy will stay with him forever, and it becomes true! And it can`t be undone; the wish has been registered with the system. Keiichi ponders what to do now, but his senpais Tamiya and Otaki arrive and find that he`s broken the rules about having girls in the all-guys dorm. What will happen to Keiichi and Belldandy now?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Voiko hänet joka uskoo, pelastaa?
Ah! Those Who Believe Shall Find Salvation!
ああっ信じる者は救われるっ?
